articles.content:
Pioneering Australian scientist Robert May, whose work in biology lead to the development of chaos theory, has died at age 84.

articles.description: SPACEX'S Starlink satellites have caused a stir across the UK, with sightings reported up and down the country - but can you see Starlink tonight?
articles.content:
Starlink visibility from London on April 28
Timings with good visibility:
4.25am - Starlink-3 - For six minutes.
Look from the west to the southeast.
9.57am - Starlink-5 - For six minutes.
Look from the west to the southeast.

articles.title: Four Discoveries of Ancient Greek Astronomy That Still Baffle Experts - Ancient Origins
articles.description: The Histories by Herodotus (484BC to 425BC) offers a remarkable window into the world as it was known by ancient Greek astronomy in the mid fifth century BC.
